WorkItem.Description:
Hello -- I've posted an issue on MSDN contracts forum, since I think it's more related to contracts than to QuickGraph, however, it does involve IImplicitUndirectedGraphContracts.cs and a false failure of Prim12240WithDelegate, a pretty subtle little fella who generates Edges on the fly in property getters. Hope you will have time to take a look at
